findings.title: No critical issues found
findings.description: The contract implements a token mechanism with several admin functions accessible by the Contract Owner, but they cannot be used maliciously to disturb user transactions.

findings.title: Buy and sell fees limits
findings.description: There are limits on buy fees (15%) and sell fees (25%) above a specific threshold defined by the Contract Owner.

findings.title: Antibot throttling mechanism
findings.description: The contract has an antibot throttling mechanism that can prevent transfers for up to 100 blocks.
